name: Ayush Anticavity Toothpaste
description: The Ayush Anti Cavity toothpaste is formulated with various ayurvedic properties. While it relieves toothaches, the clove oil aids in giving fresh breath and the dasanakanthi choornam keeps your gums healthy. Clove oil is known to give fresh breath and relieve toothaches. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
